attributes.action: Set a date with the rest of the world for the construction of the first real atlantis.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ok so lets start small here, first things first.
How can we survive in a community form at the sea bed.
Well in order to do this we must first study biospheres in a bit more depth.
First consider in this future enclousure we will be able to draw resources from the surface but would be wise to sustain ourselves as much as possible with what we'll have down there.
Also might i add that alongside studying biospheres that could go at the bottom of the sea for human culture, we should also study the possiblity of creating other ecosystems that can be resourced for the purpose of helping the environment.
Well theres where you start PM who here agrees.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
